welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Langenthal, Switzerland! Known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belp Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Euroairport France Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport France Airport, mostly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used primarily for budget airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction, expected to open in 2022.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
